name: Wraith
resistances: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, and Thunder
Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

languages.notes: The languages it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the wraith has Disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

multiattack.description: The wraith makes two Life Drain attacks.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) Necrotic damage, and the target's Hit Point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a Long Rest. The target dies if its Hit Point maximum is reduced to 0.

hit.additionalEffects: The target's Hit Point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a Long Rest. The target dies if its Hit Point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Create Specter
actions.description: The wraith targets a Humanoid within 10 feet of itself that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a Specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

summon.notes: The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.
